General.Name: SAMJIN Co. Ltd
General.Description: SAMJIN Co., Ltd. produces and sells IoT products, smart controllers, remote controllers, and speakers in South Korea and internationally. The company was formerly known as SAMJIN Plastics Industry and changed its name to SAMJIN Co., Ltd. in October 1989. SAMJIN Co., Ltd. was founded in 1975 and is based in Anyang-si, South Korea.

2.Name: Jong-Sub  Lee
2.Title: Gen. Director of Overseas Bus. and Director
